00026 // lbann_layer_convolutional .hpp .cpp - Convolutional Layer
00028 
00029 #include "lbann/layers/lbann_layer_convolutional.hpp"
00030 #include "lbann/utils/lbann_exception.hpp"
00031 #include "lbann/utils/lbann_random.hpp"
00032 
00033 using namespace std;
00034 using namespace El;
00035 using namespace lbann;
00036 
00037 convolutional_layer::convolutional_layer(const uint index,
00038                                          const int num_dims,
00039                                          const int num_input_channels,
00040                                          const int* input_dims,
00041                                          const int num_output_channels,
00042                                          const int* filter_dims,
00043                                          const int* conv_pads,
00044                                          const int* conv_strides,
00045                                          const uint mini_batch_size,
00046                                          const activation_type activation,
00047                                          const weight_initialization init,
00048                                          lbann_comm* comm,
00049                                          Optimizer* optimizer,
00050                                          std::vector<regularizer*> regs,
00051                                          cudnn::cudnn_manager* cudnn)
00052   : Layer(index, comm, optimizer, mini_batch_size, activation, regs),
00053     m_weight_initialization(init),
00054     m_num_dims(num_dims),
00055     m_num_input_channels(num_input_channels),
00056     m_num_output_channels(num_output_channels)
00057 {
00058 
00059   // Initialize input dimensions and convolution parameters
00060   m_input_dims.resize(num_dims);
00061   m_filter_dims.resize(num_dims);
00062   m_filter_size = num_input_channels*num_output_channels;
00063   m_conv_pads.resize(num_dims);
00064   m_conv_strides.resize(num_dims);
00065   for(int i=0; i<num_dims; ++i) {
00066     m_input_dims[i] = input_dims[i];
00067     m_filter_dims[i] = filter_dims[i];
00068     m_filter_size *= filter_dims[i];
00069     m_conv_pads[i] = conv_pads[i];
00070     m_conv_strides[i] = conv_strides[i];
00071   }
00072 
00073   // Calculate output dimensions
00074   m_output_dims.resize(num_dims);
00075   NumNeurons = num_output_channels;
00076   for(int i=0; i<num_dims; ++i) {
00077     m_output_dims[i] = input_dims[i]+2*conv_pads[i]-filter_dims[i]+1;
00078     m_output_dims[i] = (m_output_dims[i]+conv_strides[i]-1)/conv_strides[i];
00079     NumNeurons *= m_output_dims[i];
00080   }
00081   
00082   // Matrices should be in Star,Star and Star,VC distributions
00083   delete WB;
00084   delete WB_D;
00085   delete Zs;
00086   delete Ds;
00087   delete Ds_Temp;
00088   delete Acts;
00089   WB = new StarMat(comm->get_model_grid());
00090   WB_D = new StarMat(comm->get_model_grid());
00091   Zs = new StarVCMat(comm->get_model_grid());
00092   Ds = new StarVCMat(comm->get_model_grid());
00093   Ds_Temp = new StarVCMat(comm->get_model_grid());
00094   Acts = new StarVCMat(comm->get_model_grid());
00095 
00096   // Initialize cuDNN convolutional layer
00097   m_cudnn_layer = NULL;
00098 #ifdef __LIB_CUDNN
00099   if(cudnn)
00100     m_cudnn_layer
00101       = new cudnn::cudnn_convolutional_layer(num_dims,
00102                                              num_input_channels,
00103                                              num_output_channels,
00104                                              input_dims,
00105                                              filter_dims,
00106                                              conv_pads,
00107                                              conv_strides,
00108                                              m_mini_batch_size,
00109                                              cudnn);
00110 #endif // __LIB_CUDNN
00111 
00112 }
00113 
00114 convolutional_layer::~convolutional_layer()
00115 {
00116 #ifdef __LIB_CUDNN
00117   delete m_cudnn_layer;
00118 #endif // __LIB_CUDNN
00119 }
00120 
00121 void convolutional_layer::setup(const int num_prev_neurons)
00122 {
00123   Layer::setup(num_prev_neurons);
00124 
00125 #ifdef __LIB_CUDNN
00126   if(m_cudnn_layer) {
00127     // Setup cuDNN convolutional layer
00128     m_cudnn_layer->setup();
00129 
00130     // Get output dimensions
00131     if(NumNeurons != m_cudnn_layer->m_dst_size)
00132       throw lbann_exception("lbann_layer_convolutional: unexpected number of neurons");
00133     NumNeurons = m_cudnn_layer->m_dst_size;
00134     for(int i=0; i<m_num_dims; ++i)
00135       m_output_dims[i] = m_cudnn_layer->m_dst_dims[i+2];
00136   }
00137 #endif // __LIB_CUDNN
00138 
00139   // Check if input dimensions are valid
00140   int num_inputs = m_num_input_channels;
00141   for(int i=0; i<m_num_dims; ++i)
00142     num_inputs *= m_input_dims[i];
00143   if(num_inputs != num_prev_neurons) {
00144     throw lbann_exception("lbann_layer_convolutional: unexpected number of input neurons");
00145   }
00146 
00147   // Initialize optimizer
00148   if(optimizer)
00149     optimizer->setup(1, m_filter_size+NumNeurons);
00150 
00151   // Initialize weight-bias matrix
00152   Zeros(*WB, m_filter_size+NumNeurons, 1);
00153 
00154   // Initialize filters
00155   DistMat filters;
00156   View(filters, *WB, IR(0,m_filter_size), ALL);
00157   Int fan_in = m_filter_size / m_num_output_channels;
00158   Int fan_out = m_filter_size / m_num_input_channels;
00159   switch(m_weight_initialization) {
00160   case weight_initialization::uniform:
00161     uniform_fill(filters, filters.Height(), filters.Width(),
00162                  DataType(0), DataType(1));
00163     break;
00164   case weight_initialization::normal:
00165     gaussian_fill(filters, filters.Height(), filters.Width(),
00166                   DataType(0), DataType(1));
00167     break;
00168   case weight_initialization::glorot_normal: {
00169     const DataType var = 2.0 / (fan_in + fan_out);
00170     gaussian_fill(filters, filters.Height(), filters.Width(),
00171                   DataType(0), sqrt(var));
00172     break;
00173   }
00174   case weight_initialization::glorot_uniform: {
00175     const DataType var = 2.0 / (fan_in + fan_out);
00176     uniform_fill(filters, filters.Height(), filters.Width(),
00177                  DataType(0), sqrt(3*var));
00178     break;
00179   }
00180   case weight_initialization::he_normal: {
00181     const DataType var = 1.0 / fan_in;
00182     gaussian_fill(filters, filters.Height(), filters.Width(),
00183                   DataType(0), sqrt(var));
00184     break;
00185   }
00186   case weight_initialization::he_uniform: {
00187     const DataType var = 1.0 / fan_in;
00188     uniform_fill(filters, filters.Height(), filters.Width(),
00189                  DataType(0), sqrt(3*var));
00190     break;
00191   }
00192   case weight_initialization::zero: // Zero initialization is default
00193   default:
00194     Zero(filters);
00195     break;
00196   }
00197   
00198   // Initialize matrices
00199   Zeros(*WB_D, m_filter_size+NumNeurons, 1);
00200   Ones(*Zs, NumNeurons+1, m_mini_batch_size);
00201   Zeros(*Ds, NumNeurons+1, m_mini_batch_size);
00202   Zeros(*Ds_Temp, num_prev_neurons+1, m_mini_batch_size);
00203   Ones(*Acts, NumNeurons+1, m_mini_batch_size);
00204 
00205 }
00206 
00207 void lbann::convolutional_layer::fp_linearity(ElMat& _WB,
00208                                               ElMat& _X,
00209                                               ElMat& _Z,
00210                                               ElMat& _Y) {
00211   
00212   // Convert matrices to desired formats
00213   DistMatrixReadProxy<DataType,DataType,STAR,STAR> WBProxy(_WB);
00214   DistMatrixReadProxy<DataType,DataType,STAR,VC> XProxy(_X);
00215   DistMatrixWriteProxy<DataType,DataType,STAR,VC> ZProxy(_Z);
00216   DistMatrixWriteProxy<DataType,DataType,STAR,VC> YProxy(_Y);
00217   StarMat& WB = WBProxy.Get();
00218   StarVCMat& X = XProxy.Get();
00219   StarVCMat& Z = ZProxy.Get();
00220   StarVCMat& Y = YProxy.Get();
00221 
00222   // Get local matrices
00223   const Mat& WBLocal = WB.LockedMatrix();
00224   const Mat& XLocal = X.LockedMatrix();
00225   Mat& ZLocal = Z.Matrix();
00226   Mat& YLocal = Y.Matrix();
00227   Mat filters = WBLocal(IR(0,m_filter_size),ALL);
00228   Mat bias = WBLocal(IR(m_filter_size,END),ALL);
00229 
00230   // Apply convolution on local data samples
00231   if(m_cudnn_layer) {
00232 #ifdef __LIB_CUDNN
00233     // cuDNN convolutional layer forward pass
00234     m_cudnn_layer->forward(XLocal, filters, bias, ZLocal);
00235 #else
00236     throw lbann_exception("lbann_layer_convolutional: cuDNN not detected");
00237 #endif
00238   }
00239   else {
00240 
00242     // CPU implementation of convolutional layer forward pass
00243     // Note: explicitly constructs a dense convolution matrix
00246 
00247     // Apply bias to each sample in mini-batch
00248     for(int sample = 0; sample < XLocal.Width(); ++sample) {
00249       Mat output_sample = ZLocal(IR(0,NumNeurons), IR(sample));
00250       Copy(bias, output_sample);
00251       output_sample.Set(NumNeurons, 0, DataType(0));
00252     }
00253 
00254     // Initialize convolution matrix
00255     // Note: matrix is in form [W 0; 0 1] so that last row of output
00256     // is all ones
00257     Mat convolution_matrix;
00258     Zeros(convolution_matrix, NumNeurons + 1, XLocal.Height());
00259     convolution_matrix.Set(convolution_matrix.Height() - 1,
00260                            convolution_matrix.Width() - 1,
00261                            DataType(1));
00262 
00263     // Iterate through filters
00264     int row = 0;
00265     for(int output_channel = 0;
00266         output_channel < m_num_output_channels;
00267         ++output_channel) {
00268       const int current_filter_size = m_filter_size / m_num_output_channels;
00269       const Mat filter = filters(IR(output_channel*current_filter_size,
00270                                     (output_channel+1)*current_filter_size),
00271                                  ALL);
00272 
00273       // Iterate through filter offsets
00274       // Note: each offset corresponds to a row of the convolution matrix
00275       std::vector<int> filter_offset(m_num_dims);
00276       for(int d = 0; d < m_num_dims; ++d) {
00277         filter_offset[d] = -m_conv_pads[d];
00278       }
00279       while(filter_offset[0] + m_filter_dims[0] <= m_input_dims[0] + m_conv_pads[0]) {
00280 
00281         // Iterate through filter entries
00282         // Note: each filter entry corresponds to entry of convolution matrix
00283         std::vector<int> filter_pos(m_num_dims, 0);
00284         while(filter_pos[0] < m_filter_dims[0]) {
00285 
00286           // Get convolution matrix entry corresponding to filter entry
00287           int col = 0;
00288           int filter_flat_pos = 0;
00289           bool valid_pos = true;
00290           for(int d = 0; d < m_num_dims; ++d) {
00291             if(filter_offset[d] + filter_pos[d] < 0
00292                || filter_offset[d] + filter_pos[d] >= m_input_dims[d]) {
00293               valid_pos = false;
00294               break;
00295             }
00296             col *= m_input_dims[d];
00297             col += filter_offset[d] + filter_pos[d];
00298             filter_flat_pos *= m_filter_dims[d];
00299             filter_flat_pos += filter_pos[d];
00300           }
00301 
00302           if(valid_pos) {
00303 
00304             // Iterate through input channels
00305             for(int input_channel = 0;
00306                 input_channel < m_num_input_channels;
00307                 ++input_channel) {
00308 
00309               // Set convolution matrix entry
00310               const DataType w = filter.Get(filter_flat_pos, 0);
00311               convolution_matrix.Set(row, col, w);
00312 
00313               // Move to next convolution matrix entry
00314               col += (XLocal.Height() - 1) / m_num_input_channels;
00315               filter_flat_pos += current_filter_size / m_num_input_channels;
00316 
00317             }
00318 
00319           }
00320           
00321           // Move to next position in filter
00322           ++filter_pos[m_num_dims-1];
00323           for(int d = m_num_dims - 1; d > 0; --d) {
00324             if(filter_pos[d] >= m_filter_dims[d]) {
00325               filter_pos[d] = 0;
00326               ++filter_pos[d-1];
00327             }
00328           }
00329           
00330         }
00331 
00332         // Move to next filter offset
00333         filter_offset[m_num_dims-1] += m_conv_strides[m_num_dims-1];
00334         for(int d = m_num_dims - 1; d > 0; --d) {
00335           if(filter_offset[d] + m_filter_dims[d] > m_input_dims[d] + m_conv_pads[d]) {
00336             filter_offset[d] = -m_conv_pads[d];
00337             filter_offset[d-1] += m_conv_strides[d-1];
00338           }
00339         }
00340 
00341         // Move to next row in convolution matrix
00342         ++row;
00343 
00344       }
00345       
00346     }
00347 
00348     // Apply convolution matrix
00349     Gemm(NORMAL, NORMAL,
00350          DataType(1), convolution_matrix, XLocal,
00351          DataType(1), ZLocal);
00352 
00353   }
00354 
00355   // Z and Y are identical after fp linearity step
00356   Copy(ZLocal, YLocal);
00357 
00358 }
00359 
00360 void lbann::convolutional_layer::bp_linearity() {
00361 
00362   // Convert matrices to desired formats
00363   DistMatrixReadProxy<DataType,DataType,STAR,VC> input_proxy(*fp_input); // TODO: store from fp step
00364   StarVCMat& input = input_proxy.Get();
00365 
00366   // Get local matrices
00367   const Mat& input_local = input.LockedMatrix();
00368   const Mat& filters_local = WB->LockedMatrix()(IR(0,m_filter_size),ALL);
00369   const Mat& prev_error_signal_local = Ds->LockedMatrix();
00370   Mat filters_gradient_local = WB_D->Matrix()(IR(0,m_filter_size),ALL);
00371   Mat bias_gradient_local = WB_D->Matrix()(IR(m_filter_size,END),ALL);
00372   Mat& error_signal_local = Ds_Temp->Matrix();
00373 
00374   // Compute gradients on local data samples
00375   if(m_cudnn_layer) {
00376 #ifdef __LIB_CUDNN
00377     m_cudnn_layer->backward(input_local,
00378                             filters_local,
00379                             prev_error_signal_local,
00380                             filters_gradient_local,
00381                             bias_gradient_local,
00382                             error_signal_local);
00383 #else
00384     throw lbann_exception("lbann_layer_convolutional: cuDNN not detected");
00385 #endif
00386   }
00387   else {
00388 
00390     // CPU implementation of convolutional layer backward pass
00391     // Note: explicitly constructs a dense convolution matrix
00394 
00396     // Construct convolution matrix
00398 
00399     // Initialize convolution matrix
00400     // Note: matrix is in form [W 0; 0 1] so that last row of output
00401     // is all ones
00402     Mat convolution_matrix;
00403     Zeros(convolution_matrix, NumNeurons + 1, input_local.Height());
00404     convolution_matrix.Set(convolution_matrix.Height() - 1,
00405                            convolution_matrix.Width() - 1,
00406                            DataType(1));
00407 
00408     // Iterate through filters
00409     int row = 0;
00410     for(int output_channel = 0;
00411         output_channel < m_num_output_channels;
00412         ++output_channel) {
00413       const int current_filter_size = m_filter_size / m_num_output_channels;
00414       const Mat filter = filters_local(IR(output_channel*current_filter_size,
00415                                           (output_channel+1)*current_filter_size),
00416                                        ALL);
00417 
00418       // Iterate through filter offsets
00419       // Note: each offset corresponds to a row of the convolution matrix
00420       std::vector<int> filter_offset(m_num_dims);
00421       for(int d = 0; d < m_num_dims; ++d) {
00422         filter_offset[d] = -m_conv_pads[d];
00423       }
00424       while(filter_offset[0] + m_filter_dims[0] <= m_input_dims[0] + m_conv_pads[0]) {
00425 
00426         // Iterate through filter entries
00427         // Note: each filter entry corresponds to entry of convolution matrix
00428         std::vector<int> filter_pos(m_num_dims, 0);
00429         while(filter_pos[0] < m_filter_dims[0]) {
00430 
00431           // Get convolution matrix entry corresponding to filter entry
00432           int col = 0;
00433           int filter_flat_pos = 0;
00434           bool valid_pos = true;
00435           for(int d = 0; d < m_num_dims; ++d) {
00436             if(filter_offset[d] + filter_pos[d] < 0
00437                || filter_offset[d] + filter_pos[d] >= m_input_dims[d]) {
00438               valid_pos = false;
00439               break;
00440             }
00441             col *= m_input_dims[d];
00442             col += filter_offset[d] + filter_pos[d];
00443             filter_flat_pos *= m_filter_dims[d];
00444             filter_flat_pos += filter_pos[d];
00445           }
00446 
00447           if(valid_pos) {
00448 
00449             // Iterate through input channels
00450             for(int input_channel = 0;
00451                 input_channel < m_num_input_channels;
00452                 ++input_channel) {
00453 
00454               // Set convolution matrix entry
00455               const DataType w = filter.Get(filter_flat_pos, 0);
00456               convolution_matrix.Set(row, col, w);
00457 
00458               // Move to next convolution matrix entry
00459               col += (input_local.Height() - 1) / m_num_input_channels;
00460               filter_flat_pos += current_filter_size / m_num_input_channels;
00461 
00462             }
00463 
00464           }
00465           
00466           // Move to next position in filter
00467           ++filter_pos[m_num_dims-1];
00468           for(int d = m_num_dims - 1; d > 0; --d) {
00469             if(filter_pos[d] >= m_filter_dims[d]) {
00470               filter_pos[d] = 0;
00471               ++filter_pos[d-1];
00472             }
00473           }
00474           
00475         }
00476 
00477         // Move filter to next position
00478         filter_offset[m_num_dims-1] += m_conv_strides[m_num_dims-1];
00479         for(int d = m_num_dims - 1; d > 0; --d) {
00480           if(filter_offset[d] + m_filter_dims[d] > m_input_dims[d] + m_conv_pads[d]) {
00481             filter_offset[d] = -m_conv_pads[d];
00482             filter_offset[d-1] += m_conv_strides[d-1];
00483           }
00484         }
00485 
00486         // Move to next row in convolution matrix
00487         ++row;
00488 
00489       }
00490       
00491     }
00492 
00494     // Compute error signal
00496 
00497     // Compute error signal
00498     Gemm(TRANSPOSE, NORMAL,
00499          DataType(1), convolution_matrix, prev_error_signal_local,
00500          DataType(0), error_signal_local);
00501 
00502     // Compute bias gradient
00503     Mat ones;
00504     Ones(ones, input_local.Width(), Int(1));
00505     Gemv(NORMAL, DataType(1.0), prev_error_signal_local, ones,
00506          DataType(0.0), bias_gradient_local);
00507 
00508     // Compute error signal w.r.t. convolution matrix
00509     Mat conv_error_signal(convolution_matrix.Height(),
00510                           convolution_matrix.Width());
00511     Gemm(NORMAL, TRANSPOSE,
00512          DataType(1), prev_error_signal_local, input_local,
00513          DataType(0), conv_error_signal);
00514 
00515     // Initialize filter gradient
00516     Zero(filters_gradient_local);
00517 
00518     // Iterate through filters
00519     row = 0;
00520     for(int output_channel = 0;
00521         output_channel < m_num_output_channels;
00522         ++output_channel) {
00523       const int current_filter_size = m_filter_size / m_num_output_channels;
00524       Mat filter_gradient
00525         = filters_gradient_local(IR(output_channel*current_filter_size,
00526                                     (output_channel+1)*current_filter_size),
00527                                  ALL);
00528 
00529       // Iterate through filter offsets
00530       // Note: each offset corresponds to a row of the convolution matrix
00531       std::vector<int> filter_offset(m_num_dims);
00532       for(int d = 0; d < m_num_dims; ++d) {
00533         filter_offset[d] = -m_conv_pads[d];
00534       }
00535       while(filter_offset[0] + m_filter_dims[0] <= m_input_dims[0] + m_conv_pads[0]) {
00536 
00537         // Iterate through filter entries
00538         // Note: each filter entry corresponds to entry of convolution matrix
00539         std::vector<int> filter_pos(m_num_dims, 0);
00540         while(filter_pos[0] < m_filter_dims[0]) {
00541 
00542           // Get convolution matrix entry corresponding to filter entry
00543           int col = 0;
00544           int filter_flat_pos = 0;
00545           bool valid_pos = true;
00546           for(int d = 0; d < m_num_dims; ++d) {
00547             if(filter_offset[d] + filter_pos[d] < 0
00548                || filter_offset[d] + filter_pos[d] >= m_input_dims[d]) {
00549               valid_pos = false;
00550               break;
00551             }
00552             col *= m_input_dims[d];
00553             col += filter_offset[d] + filter_pos[d];
00554             filter_flat_pos *= m_filter_dims[d];
00555             filter_flat_pos += filter_pos[d];
00556           }
00557 
00558           if(valid_pos) {
00559 
00560             // Iterate through input channels
00561             for(int input_channel = 0;
00562                 input_channel < m_num_input_channels;
00563                 ++input_channel) {
00564 
00565               // Get error signal for convolution matrix entry
00566               filter_gradient.Update(filter_flat_pos, 0,
00567                                      conv_error_signal.Get(row, col));
00568 
00569               // Move to next convolution matrix entry
00570               col += (input_local.Height() - 1) / m_num_input_channels;
00571               filter_flat_pos += current_filter_size / m_num_input_channels;
00572 
00573             }
00574 
00575           }
00576           
00577           // Move to next position in filter
00578           ++filter_pos[m_num_dims-1];
00579           for(int d = m_num_dims - 1; d > 0; --d) {
00580             if(filter_pos[d] >= m_filter_dims[d]) {
00581               filter_pos[d] = 0;
00582               ++filter_pos[d-1];
00583             }
00584           }
00585           
00586         }
00587 
00588         // Move filter to next position
00589         filter_offset[m_num_dims-1] += m_conv_strides[m_num_dims-1];
00590         for(int d = m_num_dims - 1; d > 0; --d) {
00591           if(filter_offset[d] + m_filter_dims[d] > m_input_dims[d] + m_conv_pads[d]) {
00592             filter_offset[d] = -m_conv_pads[d];
00593             filter_offset[d-1] += m_conv_strides[d-1];
00594           }
00595         }
00596 
00597         // Move to next row in convolution matrix
00598         ++row;
00599 
00600       }
00601       
00602     }
00603 
00604   }
00605 
00606   // Obtain filter gradient with reduction and scaling
00607   AllReduce(*WB_D, mpi::COMM_WORLD);  
00608   *WB_D *= 1.0/get_effective_minibatch_size();
00609 
00610 }
00611 
00612 bool convolutional_layer::update()
00613 {
00614   if(m_execution_mode == execution_mode::training) {
00615     optimizer->update_weight_bias_matrix(*WB_D, *WB);
00616   }
00617   return true;
00618 }
00619
Generated on 21 Sep 2016 for LBANN by  1.6.1
